About me

"Here I will talk about myself in the third person."

Girish Godage, Experienced change management professional with successful track record of delivering high-profile, complex change programs in IT Application & Infrastructure. Vast practical knowledge of how to drive engagement and implement change that meets best practice goals and maximizes ROI. Areas of expertise and passions include strategy, business transformation, governance, process and organizational design, program, and project management.

Languages and Tools

  • EJS

  • HTML/CSS/SASS

BackeEnd

  • C#,Java
  • SQL Server,MySQL,PostgreSql
  • MongoDB,Sqlite3

Others

  • Machine Learning
  • Micro-services
  • AWS, Microsoft Azure, Heroku
  • Version Control - Git, BitBucket

Skills

Python

I'm a passionate python coder. I like to code on my free time. I have created few repositories on github, which I made using Python language. One of them include a Twitter Setnitment to CSV . I like to code in a short and sweet way.

Angular

I developed websites with Angular and WebAPI(.net C#,java,Node). This Website is made With HTML and CSS.

Designing

I am a Passionate Designing & thinking of Web and Mobile application too. I Love to use my skills and experience to design and devloped application for various Industry.

Services

Consulting

IT consulting services,are the advisory services that help you to assess different technology strategies and, in doing so, align your technology strategies with your business or process strategies.

Web Application Development

I can help you to build a robust scalabale web applications to suit you or your business needs.

Optimization and Maintenance

If you currently own a website and you need to further improve the site's ability to drive your business goals.

Would you like to know more or just discuss something?
